prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with sharp wings and a sleek, menacing design.
Imagine a legendary creature that harnesses the power of light and darkness.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies mystery with angular shapes and a shadowy appearance.
Design a mythical Pokemon that can manipulate energy and has an imposing presence.
Generate a creature that has a jet-black color scheme and radiates a powerful aura.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique silhouette that's both elegant and intimidating.
Make a creature that can blend into the shadows with an ethereal glow.
